column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi DW Y. - Thank you for the excellent review. I'm glad we rank among your favorite ramen houses. You are correct
column3: we have cultivated a latenight crowd
column4: especially on the weekends since we stay open until 2AM. But
column6: I'm glad you received good service and enjoyed our fare. We look forward to serving you again soon.
